scripts.generate-llms: npm --prefix mdx-to-md-converter ci && npm --prefix mdx-to-md-converter run convert
scripts.build: npm run sitemap && npm run fetch:models && next build
scripts.postbuild: sh -c "if [ -d public/llms ]; then mkdir -p out/llms && cp -R public/llms/* out/llms/; fi; if [ -f public/all-links-llms.txt ]; then cp public/all-links-llms.txt out/all-links-llms.txt; fi"
